data.text:
Hey hey, so what are ya gonna wear this year? Are 
you gonna be a witch? Or maybe… a black cat?
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>Hey hey, so what are ya gonna wear this year? Are 
<story>you gonna be a witch? Or maybe… a black cat?

data.text:
Jeez, stop messing around and help me with preparing the food! 
The ones in charge this year are…
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed:
<story>Jeez, stop messing around and help me with preparing the food! 
<story>The ones in charge this year are…

data.text:
…As it stands, the Ritto dormitory will be in charge of this 
year's joint dormitory Halloween party.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>…As it stands, the Ritto dormitory will be in charge of this 
<story>year's joint dormitory Halloween party.

data.text:
And it has been decided that I, Mihono Bourbon, 
will be the leader of the preparation committee. 
I look forward to working with you all.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>And it has been decided that I, Mihono Bourbon, 
<story>will be the leader of the preparation committee. 
<story>I look forward to working with you all.

data.text:
And Creek and I'll be takin' care of the 
costumes! Everyone, let's do our best!!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>And Creek and I'll be takin' care of the 
<story>costumes! Everyone, let's do our best!!

data.text:
The costumes will be made in collaboration with 
the school staff, so if anyone has a desired costume, 
please fill out the application form.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>The costumes will be made in collaboration with 
<story>the school staff, so if anyone has a desired costume, 
<story>please fill out the application form.

data.text:
Anyways, Bourbon, this yer first time bein' 
in charge, ain't it? Anythin' worryin ya?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Anyways, Bourbon, this yer first time bein' 
<story>in charge, ain't it? Anythin' worryin ya?

data.text:
Last year Inari was put in charge of 
Miho. That sure was a mess, huh…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Last year Inari was put in charge of 
<story>Miho. That sure was a mess, huh…

data.text:
There is no problem. My mission of ordering sweets for the joint 
dormitory Halloween party has already concluded.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>There is no problem. My mission of ordering sweets for the joint 
<story>dormitory Halloween party has already concluded.

data.text:
Continuing with last year's theme, I have also ordered a smoke 
machine, which has already arrived. It will be loaned out to the 
equipment committee once a thorough analysis has been conducted.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Continuing with last year's theme, I have also ordered a smoke 
<story>machine, which has already arrived. It will be loaned out to the 
<story>equipment committee once a thorough analysis has been conducted.

data.text: Wow. Bourbon-chan, you're doing as great a job as ever.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed: <story>Wow. Bourbon-chan, you're doing as great a job as ever.

data.text:
However, when I attempted to turn the smoke machine on in order 
to conduct a test run, no smoke came out. Therefore, one can 
reasonably conclude that there is a possibility…
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>However, when I attempted to turn the smoke machine on in order 
<story>to conduct a test run, no smoke came out. Therefore, one can 
<story>reasonably conclude that there is a possibility…

data.text: (Beeeeeep!! Pshuuuuu!!!!)
data.name: Smoke Machine
data.processed: <story>(Beeeeeep!! Pshuuuuu!!!!)

data.text: Kyaaaaa!? Waaaahhh!?
data.name: Horsegirls
data.processed: <story>Kyaaaaa!? Waaaahhh!?

data.text:
Cough… I was worried that there might be some adverse side 
effects. However, since the smoke consists mainly of water 
vapor, there should be no harm… Cough.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Cough… I was worried that there might be some adverse side 
<story>effects. However, since the smoke consists mainly of water 
<story>vapor, there should be no harm… Cough.

data.text: …You sure yer okay?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>…You sure yer okay?

data.text:
Preparations began for the joint dormitory Halloween party. The 
leader of the preparation committee, Mihono Bourbon was…
data.processed:
<story>Preparations began for the joint dormitory Halloween party. The 
<story>leader of the preparation committee, Mihono Bourbon was…

data.text:
Butter for the cooking committee has been acquired. Now I must 
acquire some light bulbs for the equipment committee. 
Afterwards, I need to prepare a time table for the information 
committee, then contact the costume committee, then…
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Butter for the cooking committee has been acquired. Now I must 
<story>acquire some light bulbs for the equipment committee. 
<story>Afterwards, I need to prepare a time table for the information 
<story>committee, then contact the costume committee, then…

data.text: (Bonk! Brunk, Brrrr…!!)
data.processed: <story>(Bonk! Brunk, Brrrr…!!)

data.text:
…Manufacturing of a spare jack-o-lantern has failed. Therefore, 
I will prepare this pumpkin as a meal for myself instead…
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>…Manufacturing of a spare jack-o-lantern has failed. Therefore, 
<story>I will prepare this pumpkin as a meal for myself instead…

data.text:
Preparing guide materials. The Tracen Academy Halloween event 
was created for international students. However, the event 
focuses on entertainment rather than nostalgia…
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Preparing guide materials. The Tracen Academy Halloween event 
<story>was created for international students. However, the event 
<story>focuses on entertainment rather than nostalgia…

data.text:
Bourbon-san… She seems so busy… After all, the joint dormitory 
Halloween party is going to be incredibly large…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Bourbon-san… She seems so busy… After all, the joint dormitory 
<story>Halloween party is going to be incredibly large…

data.text:
But if we offer to help her without knowing what we're doing, it 
will just end up causing her to have more work…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>But if we offer to help her without knowing what we're doing, it 
<story>will just end up causing her to have more work…

data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: Rice-san?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Rice-san?

data.text: Ah… S-Sorry… I… agree with you…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Ah… S-Sorry… I… agree with you…

data.text: …I really do… But…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>…I really do… But…

data.text: (Nom, munchmunch… Haah…)
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>(Nom, munchmunch… Haah…)

data.text:
(I wonder if that pumpkin is the failed 
jack-o-lantern that she had mentioned…)
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>(I wonder if that pumpkin is the failed 
<story>jack-o-lantern that she had mentioned…)

data.text:
All that is left of this pumpkin is… 15kg 
600g… This should keep me hydrated…
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>All that is left of this pumpkin is… 15kg 
<story>600g… This should keep me hydrated…

data.text: Hey… Bourbon-san. Would you like our help finishing that?
data.name: Ritto Student
data.processed: <story>Hey… Bourbon-san. Would you like our help finishing that?

data.text:
I refuse. You all have your own tasks at hand currently. Not to 
mention that this is the result of my failure, therefore, I 
should resolve it on my own.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I refuse. You all have your own tasks at hand currently. Not to 
<story>mention that this is the result of my failure, therefore, I 
<story>should resolve it on my own.

data.text:
Hmm? Rice, people've been lining up behind you 
for a while now, ya know? If ya want a carrot 
hamburg steak feel free and get one.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Hmm? Rice, people've been lining up behind you 
<story>for a while now, ya know? If ya want a carrot 
<story>hamburg steak feel free and get one.

data.text:
Whaa!? Sorry, I am so sorry! I didn't 
realize that I had lined up… Umm…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>Whaa!? Sorry, I am so sorry! I didn't 
<story>realize that I had lined up… Umm…

data.text:
What? Got somethin' to say to Bourbon? Then 
why doncha just tell her? Go on now.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>What? Got somethin' to say to Bourbon? Then 
<story>why doncha just tell her? Go on now.

data.text: Bourbon, excuse me. Rice's got somethin' to talk to you about.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Bourbon, excuse me. Rice's got somethin' to talk to you about.

data.text: N-No… I… can't… say it…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>N-No… I… can't… say it…

data.text:
Eh!? Wastin' time by not sayin' anythings just gonna make it 
harder to say, ya know? Just start the conversation off with 
somethin' simple. Like how bout the weather?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Eh!? Wastin' time by not sayin' anythings just gonna make it 
<story>harder to say, ya know? Just start the conversation off with 
<story>somethin' simple. Like how bout the weather?

data.text: Eeh!? W-Well… Err, umm…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Eeh!? W-Well… Err, umm…

data.text: To… today's weather sure is great, isn't it…?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>To… today's weather sure is great, isn't it…?

data.text: I agree, it is sunny today.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>I agree, it is sunny today.
<story>…

data.text: Eh…? What's with the tension here? Is this a blind date?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Eh…? What's with the tension here? Is this a blind date?

data.text: Ara ara…
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed: <story>Ara ara…

data.text:
And so the preparations for the Tracen Academy joint 
dormitory Halloween party began in earnest. Will 
the girls truly be able to pull it off?
data.processed:
<story>And so the preparations for the Tracen Academy joint 
<story>dormitory Halloween party began in earnest. Will 
<story>the girls truly be able to pull it off?

data.text: That night…
data.processed: <story>That night…

data.text: Kyaaaa!!
data.name: Dorm Student
data.processed: <story>Kyaaaa!!

data.text: There was a scream so loud it could deafen the gods above…
data.processed: <story>There was a scream so loud it could deafen the gods above…
